---
title: "Chapter 6: Importing data into R"
---

In this chapter we will explore different ways of importing tabular data into R. 

We will go over several examples and troubleshoot some common issues when importing data.

We will also introduce "data frames", the R equivalent of a spreadsheet and various ways to inspect them.
